content.text: These behaviors at prometaphase highlight the temporal coordination of the entire cell during mitosis. This ensures proper and robust inheritance of the DNA and all the cellular contents.
Mitosis has not been extensively characterized in human stem cells.

We present the Integrated Mitotic Stem Cell as
  • •the first model to consider all of the main cellular components during mitosis in an integrated and standardized system
  • •the first characterization of mitosis in an undifferentiated human stem cell
  • •an important baseline model and dataset to compare with the behavior of other human cells, e.g. cancer
  • •a tool to explore a 15 organelle mitotic system in 3D
This serves as an important baseline model and dataset to compare with the behavior of other human cells including those with aberrant mitosis as is often seen in cancer.
